mapper.insert: insert into LEDEN_COLLECT_VOICEPRINT (PK_ID, RYJCXXCJBH, QBYP_SC, YXYP_SC, XZB, NLZ, XXZLDF, LYYZDM, LYSB, FYFSDM, XDDM, HYFYDM, DELETAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME, YPSJ, SWSJ) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qbypSc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxypSc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nlz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xxzldf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lyyzdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lysb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyfsdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xddm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hyfydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ypsj,jdbcType=BLOB}, #{swsj,jdbcType=BLOB})

mapper.update:
update LEDEN_COLLECT_VOICEPRINT
RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QBYP_SC = #{qbypSc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YXYP_SC = #{yxypSc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XZB = #{xzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NLZ = #{nlz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XXZLDF = #{xxzldf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LYYZDM = #{lyyzdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LYSB = #{lysb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FYFSDM = #{fyfsdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XDDM = #{xddm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HYFYDM = #{hyfydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETAG = #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNEX = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
YPSJ = #{ypsj,jdbcType=BLOB},
SWSJ = #{swsj,jdbcType=BLOB},
where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LEDEN_COLLECT_VOICEPRINT set RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QBYP_SC = #{qbypSc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YXYP_SC = #{yxypSc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XZB = #{xzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NLZ = #{nlz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XXZLDF = #{xxzldf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LYYZDM = #{lyyzdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LYSB = #{lysb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FYFSDM = #{fyfsdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XDDM = #{xddm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HYFYDM = #{hyfydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETAG = #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANNEX = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, YPSJ = #{ypsj,jdbcType=BLOB}, SWSJ = #{swsj,jdbcType=BLOB} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LEDEN_COLLECT_VOICEPRINT set RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QBYP_SC = #{qbypSc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YXYP_SC = #{yxypSc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XZB = #{xzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NLZ = #{nlz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XXZLDF = #{xxzldf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LYYZDM = #{lyyzdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LYSB = #{lysb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FYFSDM = #{fyfsdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XDDM = #{xddm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HYFYDM = #{hyfydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETAG = #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANNEX = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rowno,LEDEN_COLLECT_VOICEPRINT.*
FROM LEDEN_COLLECT_VOICEPRINT
where ROWNUM <= #{end}) collectVoicePrint
WHERE collectVoicePrint.rowno >= #{start}

select ,d1.name as lyyzmc,d2.name as fyfsmc,d3.name as xdmc,d4.name as hyfymc from LEDEN_COLLECT_VOICEPRINT v left join sys_dict_list d1 on v.lyyzdm = d1.code and d1.sign = 'DICT_LYYZH' left join sys_dict_list d2 on v.fyfsdm = d2.code and d2.sign = 'DICT_FYFS' left join sys_dict_list d3 on v.xddm = d3.code and d3.sign = 'DICT_XD' left join sys_dict_list d4 on v.hyfydm = d4.code and d4.sign = 'DICT_HYFY' where v.RYJCXXCJBH = #{id}
select YPSJ from LEDEN_COLLECT_VOICEPRINT where RYJCXXCJBH = #{id}
select SWSJ from LEDEN_COLLECT_VOICEPRINT where RYJCXXCJBH = #{id}

select v.*, pa.plug_in_id as sbxh, d1.name as speakTypeName, d2.name as languageTypeName, d3.name as dialectName from leden_collect_voiceprint v left join leden_collect_person p on p.ryjcxxcjbh=v.ryjcxxcjbh left join leden_equipment e on e.equipment_code=p.equipment_code left join leden_equipment_parets pa on e.pk_id=pa.equipment_pkId left join sys_dict_list d1 on d1.code=v.FYFSDM left join sys_dict_list d2 on d2.code=v.LYYZDM left join sys_dict_list d3 on d3.code=v.HYFYDM where v.ryjcxxcjbh=#{_parameter} and pa.node_code='000000000007'
